arts.ttl: Norwich vs Bristol City predictions: Canaries can conclude their Norfolk nightmare
arts.sum: Norwich take on Bristol City in the Championship on Saturday and Dan Childs anticipates a victory for the home side, who are aiming to snap a five-game winless run.

arts.ttl: Norwich vs Bristol City - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Championship clash between Norwich City and Bristol City, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
